content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (10.5, 10.5)), boiler (position (-6.0, 24.5)), and offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5)) connected by a pipe group (fluid system 6262 and 6266).

### Copper plate mine at position (43.0, -84.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill (position (43.0, -84.0)) and multiple furnaces at positions (40.0, -82.0), (45.0, -83.0), (42.0, -81.0), (45.0, -80.0), and (40.0, -79.0).

### Iron ore mine at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)).

### Lab at position (unknown)
Consists of a lab with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 67}.

### Electricity distribution at position (unknown)
Consists of an electricity group (id 7903) with poles at positions (8.5, 9.5), (2.5, 2.5), (4.5, 5.5), and (2.5, 1.5).

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when researching Automation
- Ensure you have automation science packs in your inventory before attempting to research Automation.

### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Make sure to place the drill in a location where it can output items to a sink entity, such as a chest or a belt.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place a new entity.

### Errors when using furnaces
- Make sure to provide ingredients for the furnace to smelt, otherwise it will be in a NO_INGREDIENTS status.

### Errors when using labs
- Ensure you have the required science packs in your inventory before attempting to research a technology.

### Errors when using burner inserters
- Make sure the inserter has fuel and is waiting for source items before attempting to use it.

### Errors when using steam engines and boilers
- Ensure the steam engine and boiler are connected by a pipe group and have a fluid system.

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure the offshore pump is connected to a pipe group and has a fluid system.
